articles.description: England face New Zealand in the second Test in Wellington - follow text and score updates.
articles.title: New Zealand vs England LIVE: Cricket score & updates from second Test, day two, Wellington

articles.description: Gus Atkinson takes the 15th hat-trick by an England bowler to rattle through the New Zealand tail on the second day of the second Test in Wellington.
articles.title: New Zealand vs England: Gus Atkinson takes hat-trick in second Test in Wellington

articles.description: Under-pressure manager Julen Lopetegui says "we are going to change the situation" at struggling West Ham.
articles.title: Julen Lopetegui: Under-pressure manager vows to 'change' West Ham's fortunes

articles.description: Bath fall short of completing a thrilling comeback in torrential conditions at the Rec as La Rochelle hold on to claim an opening-game victory in the Champions Cup.
articles.title: Bath 20-24 La Rochelle: Two-time winners hold off Bath fightback

articles.description: Arne Slot says his Liverpool players are used to the pressure of having to win as they seek to maintain their advantage at the top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Liverpool players are used to pressure - Arne Slot

articles.description: New head coach Ruben Amorim says Manchester United are "a massive club but not a massive team" as he tries to steer the club back towards the top of the English game.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim says Manchester United are "a massive club but not a massive team" says

articles.description: Planet Premier League pundits Statman Dave, Nedum Onuoha and former Arsenal player Gilberto Silva discuss how teams can defend the Gunners' set-pieces.
articles.title: Planet Premier League: How do teams stop Arsenal's set-pieces?

articles.description: Gloucester get their European Challenge Cup campaign off to a winning start with a dogged 15-7 victory against Edinburgh.
articles.title: Challenge Cup: Gloucester 15-7 Edinburgh - Dogged win for hosts in tough conditions

articles.description: Emma Raducanu hopes to exploit her natural athleticism and reduce injury as she hires Maria Sharapova’s former fitness Yutaka Nakamura.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu hires fitness coach Yutaka Nakamura
